__TOC__

Gutsy is coming, and it is scheduled for release on '''Thursday 18th October 2007'''. What better way to celebrate the last six months of effort than by getting together with other Ubuntu fans and having a party?!

If you want to organise a release party:

* Read <nowiki>[[BuildingCommunity/RunningReleaseParty|this guide]]</nowiki> to how to run a party.
* Join the ubuntu-event-planners mailing list (do this at https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/Ubuntu-event-planners) where you can find other event organisers to get help and advise from.

If you have a release party scheduled, be sure to:

* Add it to this page.
* Blog about it, advertise it, tell your friends, tell local media, tell podcasts and otherwise promote it.
* Join the IRC channel #ubuntu-release-party on irc.freenode.net
* Record a video or photograph the party. If you video it please say "Happy Release 7.10 from <wherever you are>" as  a group in the video and send it to gerry.carr@canonical.com. We want to pull together a compilation video for all to share.
* If you post photos to Flickr, tag them with Ubuntu and Ubuntu Release Party

=== Confirmed Parties ===

Here is a list of all confirmed parties. Expect this list to grow as we get nearer to the Gutsy release.
